typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		H as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Customer_Id as string,
		Open_Date as string,
		Last_Consulted_Date as string,
		Vaccination_Id as string,
		Dr_Name as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		DOB as string,
		Is_Active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source
source select(mapColumn(
		Customer_Name,
		Customer_Id,
		Open_Date,
		Last_Consulted_Date,
		Vaccination_Id,
		Dr_Name,
		State,
		Country,
		DOB,
		Is_Active
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(Open_Date = toDate(concat(substring(Open_Date,1,4),'-',substring(Open_Date,5,2),'-',substring(Open_Date,7,2)) , 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		Last_Consulted_Date = toDate(concat(substring(Last_Consulted_Date,1,4),'-',substring(Last_Consulted_Date,5,2),'-',substring(Last_Consulted_Date,7,2)) , 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		DOB = toDate(concat(substring(DOB,5,4),'-',substring(DOB,3,2),'-',substring(DOB,1,2)) , 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn sink(input(
		Customer_Name as string,
		Customer_ID as string,
		Customer_Open_Date as date,
		Last_Consulted_Date as date,
		Vaccination_Type as string,
		Doctor_Consulted as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		Post_Code as integer,
		Date_of_Birth as date,
		Active_Customer as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Customer_Name,
		Customer_ID = Customer_Id,
		Customer_Open_Date = Open_Date,
		Last_Consulted_Date,
		Vaccination_Type = Vaccination_Id,
		Doctor_Consulted = Dr_Name,
		State,
		Country,
		Date_of_Birth = DOB,
		Active_Customer = Is_Active
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink
